title: Decolletage Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Decolletage Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
reposado tequila
1
ounce
Dubonnet Rouge
1/2
ounce
Aperol
1/4
ounce
Fernet Branca
Orange twist
for garnish
Directions
Stir over ice and strain into an ice-filled brandy snifter (or double old-fashioned glass). Break orange twist over the drink, then add as garnish.
Special equipment
Cocktail strainer
Tequila
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
